name: Elemental Warlord
description:
Elemental Warlord is Offline RPG game.

You are Orc Shaman,and You want to learn to be the best Shaman in the world.Neo and Blu will teach You how to move and use spells,You can choose the gender of Your character,and You can set Yours name.There are several kinds of monsters You can slay,and many suprises waiting for You in this world.

In this game You can also find:

2 Armors
4 Different Spells
6 Different Monsters to slay
7 Weapons
15 Locations
30 Levels of the character

1 secret Shop Keeper,but not so well hidden...

And so many time to spend in Elemental Warlord!

WAIT,one more thing...You can find Your total time played in the Main Menu!

THIS GAME IS ALSO MADE FOR KIDS!

Official Website: https://neidnex5.webnode.com/
